metadata.title: CVE-2022-3100 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the openstack-barbican component. This issue allows anaccess policy bypass via a query string when accessing the API.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3100` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

barbican-api - 1:6.0.1-0ubuntu1.2
barbican-common - 1:6.0.1-0ubuntu1.2
barbican-keystone-listener - 1:6.0.1-0ubuntu1.2
barbican-worker - 1:6.0.1-0ubuntu1.2
python-barbican - 1:6.0.1-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: barbican package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:6.0.1-0ubuntu1.2').
